phrases: I will sacrifice Passive Defense, Blinding Light, and Night Vision to create...
Is that what you thought I would say?
This is not enough for me to... lose!
This is honestly a pain, so I am going to end it now.
Do not go dying on me.
I want to be your student!
Wow, that must have taken a lot of guts.
But that is such a pain...
Aw, his cute, pristine face is going to get dirty.
I will do my best, even if it kills me!
Why are you so obsessed with this?
I promised my childhood friend, who passed away, that I would become
the best adventurer in the world.
So I am going to become the best adventurer in the world,
one whose name is known even to the heavens.
I will give you a chance to be my student.
If you give me so much as a scratch, you win.
Wait, in the middle of the city?
You want to be the best in the world, right?
You are terrible at lying, are not you?
You hold your sword entirely too straight.
Maybe it is none of my business,
but you should give up on becoming an adventurer.
The boy just refused to give up.
Could you tell me about goblins?
Aw, but that is such a pain.
I am sure even you would be able to take down a goblin.
But be careful with iron goblins.
Their flesh is super hard, so go after their eyes instead.
Even after a month had passed, the boy showed up every day.
I am pretty sure I will not be able to use that method,
so I will just swing around my sword more.
Thanks for all your valuable advice today!
Maybe becoming an actual mentor might not be such a bad thing.
Barkeep, I will take the usual.
Olivia, should you be here right now?
My daughter was attacked by a monster, and he saved her.
By the time I had gotten back with the guards, it was too late.
The monster was the rare iron goblin.
He stabbed the monster's eye with his sword so my daughter could escape.
A face as sweet and calm as the moon.
What if I had taught him properly?
What if I had actually become his master and Bestowed skills upon him?
If I had chosen a different yesterday,
then a different tomorrow would have...
What awaited me after that was 200 years of being alone.
Noir, you looked remarkably like that boy.
I may have given you those skills just to make myself feel better.
It will not change the past, and the regrets remain.
Let me see your smiling face again.
My body still will not move.
The effects of Sacrifice are gone now, too.
Aw, are not you going to plead for your life?
L-Like I would ever do that!
I figured we could come up with a plan to face that fake together.
You are one of my adventurers, Noir.
I want to use these powers for others.
Noir is my rival and friend.
I cannot let him do this alone!
Look at all your cute little friends.
I appreciate the concern, but she is too powerful.
Everyone is grateful to you, Noir.
You are always helping us out.
I became the top receptionist because of you, Noir.
I was all alone, and you let me join your party.
We captured those phantom thieves together!
So... at least let us repay you a little.
Well, are not you popular, Noir?
Hey, you have got a gun?!
Is it because it was a skill attack?
Guess I will have to teach you what happens when you butt in.
The one who is... going to defeat my rival in love...
Yikes, talk about the strength of a gorilla.
Who are you calling a gorilla?!
If you do that too much, the bridge will
It is no use acting all meek and adorable now!
Touching that sword is bad news.
I will have to use Editor and...
That was a pretty fiery attack!
We have to heal her quickly!
She did it to Emma, too!
Aw, you are all alone again.
The Hidden Dungeon Only I Can Enter!
She does not have any weapons.
I have a better chance fighting up close!
Sh-She messed with my skills again?
Create and fire a stone from around 10100 centimeters by using LP.
After that, the stone comes back to you.
She is way more perceptive than I am, her instincts are insane,
and she is way better at using skills than I am.
Why do not you just give up?
I mean, you can still survive, albeit pathetically.
I am not afraid of living pathetically.
Being born to a baronet family, I am basically destined for a pathetic life.
I do not mind looking away for a sec.
No matter how pathetic my life is...
As long as I try, I can change!
I learned that after I met Master!
I am going to save Master!
I do not have time to think about the outcome anymore!
I am going to give up everything Master gave me except Get Creative,
I will engulf you in flames until there is nothing left!
You and your silly feelings toward your master!
Sh-She still has this much power left?
I just have to do this!
I have friends who can lift them!
I-It is all thanks to you guys.
I used up too much LP.
And so, after defeating the Death Chains, I went to see Master.
You are ruining that adorable face of yours.
You must have been hurting for so long...
Why did not you tell me?
Is it because I am so unreliable?
You are just such a sweetheart.
I did not want you to push yourself.
But apparently, you are much stronger and braver than I thought you were.
You are going to make me fall for you.
Th-There you go, treating me like a kid again.
Aw, I would not say that.
Stop playing with my face, please!
But I have been waiting so long to touch it!
If you had not shown up that day, I would still be stuck in that room.
I might have spent an eternity in there.
Well, my life changed so much because I met you, Master.
Now, if I gamble these earnings at a casino...
Yeah, my friend helped me acquire them.
Nory, I hope you come see me again.
So in conclusion, becoming a hero is no small feat.
You will need to train not only your body, but your mind, as well.
Make sure you do not slack off!
You need to put all of your weight into your fists.
You go like this... then this!
Are you some kind of womanizer, Noir?
If you want more LP, you should talk to me first.
So we are fighting to the death over Brother Dearest.
I will be happy to join in.
Did you get back all the skills you used for Sacrifice?
I am going to slowly build my LP back up and create them using Get Creative.
I bet you are doing all kinds of things with those girls.
M-More importantly, are we going to go past the 15th floor?
when I was captured by the Death Chains, I heard its thoughts.
Free her without killing her and a path will appear
If we break that stone monument, there should be stairs under it.
I do not know how many floors this thing has,
but if you can get to floor 100, you might become as powerful as me.
Hidden dungeon only I can enter!
Let me train in secret to become the strongest in the world!
